author: Joshua Jamerson
title: In Campaign Form, Trump Extols Himself and a Struggling GOP Candidate
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”President Donald Trump returned to the campaign trail Saturday, talking up a possible meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, lashing out at the media, criticizing his Oval Office predecessors and announcing a slogan for his 2020 re-election bid.
The president was speaking in Moon Township, Pa., where he sought to rally his supporters behind Republican Rick Saccone, who is running for Congress in a tight race against Democrat Conor Lamb.
...
